title: Schwarzmönch
text:
The Schwarzmönch (<a href="German%20language">German</a> for "black monk") (2,649 m) is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Bernese%20Alps">Bernese Alps</a>, overlooking <a href="Lauterbrunnen">Lauterbrunnen</a> in the <a href="Bernese%20Oberland">Bernese Oberland</a>. It forms a huge <a href="buttress">buttress</a> on the north-west side of the <a href="Jungfrau">Jungfrau</a>, to which it is connected by the ridge named "Ufem Schwarzen Grat".
East the summit is located the Silberhorn Hut.
